pages.text: Gross.$(br)This questionable stew is part of the $(marked)pledging$() rite.$(br)By drinking while deeply looking into the eyes of a $(marked)Greater Demon$(), a witch can pledge to them.$(br)Pledging to a $(marked)Greater Demon$() has unique benefits depending on the Demon.$(br)The exact benefits are outlined in the according entries.
A Demon that is pledged to has to remain in the world for the pledge to be active.$(br)Attacking the demon in any way will immediately revoke the pledge.
